i m from seattle.

participant_2.background:
I have two things I love: cookies and my long curly hair.
I've been with my husband for 5 years and we love to cosplay together.
I'm from the Midwest, where I learned to love the arts and crafts.
i care about the way i look when i am in public.
I enjoy trying new ethnic foods with my friends from out of town.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
It's going great! What's up?
Not much, just working on a project. Where are you from?
I'm from the Midwest, how about you?
I'm from Seattle!
Oh, nice! I've always wanted to go to Seattle!
You should! It's a beautiful city. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to cosplay and cook, and I'm also really into arts and crafts.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. What kind of food do you like to make?
I love to make cookies and breads, but I also love to try new ethnic foods.
I love trying new ethnic foods too! I'm not so good at cooking them, but I love to eat them.
Me too! I love to cook for my friends and family.
That's so nice! I'm sure they love it.
They do! I'm always trying new recipes and they're always so happy to try them.
That's great! I love cooking for people too. It's so much fun to see them enjoy the food you've made.
It is! I love seeing their faces light up when they taste something new.
Me too! It's the best feeling in the world.
It is! I love to make people happy.
Me too! I think that's the best thing about cooking.
I agree! Cooking is the best.
It is! I love it
